languages.text: {n}Голос инквизитора становится еще более вкрадчивым и тихим.{/n} "Опасное заблуждение. Возможно, вас это расстроит, но я буду вам указывать, какую богохульную мерзость вы имеете право уничтожить, а какую не посмеете тронуть и пальцем".

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос инквизитора становится еще более вкрадчивым и тихим.{/n} "Опасное заблуждение. Возможно, вас это расстроит, но я буду вам указывать, какую богохульную мерзость вы имеете право уничтожить, а какую не посмеете тронуть и пальцем".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

languages.text: {n}大审判官的声音变得更加柔和，更加含蓄。{/n}“这是个危险的错觉。尽管这个事实可能会让你感到不安，但我确实会告诉你，哪些异端造物你有权摧毁，还有哪些异端造物你连碰都不能碰。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长的声音变得更加柔和，更加含蓄。{/n}“这是个危险的错觉。尽管这个事实可能会让你感到不安，但我确实会告诉你，哪些异端造物你有权摧毁，还有哪些异端造物你连碰都不能碰。”

languages.text: {n}La voz del Lord Inquisidor se vuelve más suave y sinuosa.{/n} «Es un delirio peligroso. Por mucho que le moleste, sí voy a decirle qué abominaciones herejes tiene derecho a destruir y cuáles no debe tocar en absoluto».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Lord Inquisidor se vuelve más suave y sinuosa.{/n} "Es un delirio peligroso. Por mucho que le moleste, sí voy a decirle qué abominaciones herejes tiene derecho a destruir y cuáles no debe tocar en absoluto».

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターの声は一段とやわらかさを帯びて当てつけがましさが増す。{/n}「危険な妄想だ。動揺させるようだが、忌まわしき異端の中でもお前に犯す権利があるもの、また指一本触れることも許されぬものはどれなのかをしかと伝えよう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターの声は一段とやわらかさを帯びて当てつけがましさが増す。{/n}「危険な妄想だ。動揺させるようだが、忌まわしき異端の中でもお前に犯す権利があるもの、また指一本触れることも許されぬものはどれなのかをしかと伝えよう」

languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Großinquisitors wird noch sanfter und vieldeutiger.{/n} "Ein gefährlicher Trugschluss. Es mag Euch nicht gefallen, aber ich schreibe Euch in der Tat vor, welche ketzerischen Abscheulichkeiten Ihr rechtmäßig vernichten dürft, und von welchen Ihr die Finger zu lassen habt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Großinquisitors wird noch sanfter und vieldeutiger.{/n} "Ein gefährlicher Trugschluss. Es mag Euch nicht gefallen, aber ich schreibe Euch in der Tat vor, welche ketzerischen Abscheulichkeiten Ihr rechtmäßig vernichten dürft, und von welchen Ihr die Finger zu lassen habt."

languages.text: « Une illusion des plus dangereuses, {n}rétorque l'Inquisiteur d'une voix qui se fait de plus en plus douce et pleine de sous-entendus.{/n} Que cela vous convienne ou non, je compte bien vous dire exactement quelles abominations hérétiques vous pouvez détruire, et lesquelles vous devez laisser en paix. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

traits.locale_text: « Une illusion des plus dangereuses, {n}rétorque l'Inquisiteur d'une voix qui se fait de plus en plus douce et pleine de sous-entendus.{/n} Que cela vous convienne ou non, je compte bien vous dire exactement quelles abominations hérétiques vous pouvez détruire, et lesquelles vous devez laisser en paix. »

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sesi daha da yumuşayıp içe işler bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli bir yanılgı. Hayal kırıklığı yaratacağım ama sana gerçekten de hangi kâfir garabetini yok etmeye hakkın olduğunu, hangisine ise elini sürmenin yasak olduğunu söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice becomes even softer and more insinuating.{/n} "A dangerous delusion. Upsetting as it may be for you, I will indeed tell you which heretical abominations you have the right to destroy, and which you are not to lay a finger on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sesi daha da yumuşuyor ve daha da içe işler bir hâl alıyor:{/n} "Tehlikeli bir yanılgı. Hayal kırıklığı yaratacağım ama sana gerçekten de hangi kâfir garabetini yok etmeye hakkın olduğunu, hangisine ise elini sürmenin yasak olduğunu söyleyebilirim."
